'''The Council of Elrond Assembles''' is the seventh track of disc two of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].

The first half of the track features the song "[[Aníron]]", composed and performed by [[Enya]].
